titles.title: Badger-Two Medicine Protection Act
Badger-Two Medicine Protection Act
A bill to establish the Badger-Two Medicine Cultural Heritage Area in the State of Montana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Badger-Two Medicine Protection Act
This bill establishes the Badger-Two Medicine Cultural Heritage Area in Montana.
The Department of Agriculture must develop a comprehensive plan for the long-term protection and management of the Cultural Heritage Area as an amendment to the land and resource management plan for the Helena-Lewis and Clark National Forest in Montana.
